tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE economic_benefits_of_gmos (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR,
    gmo_trait VARCHAR,
    yield_increase DECIMAL,
    profit_increase DECIMAL,
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Economic_Benefits (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   crop_name VARCHAR(255),
   gmo_used BOOLEAN,
   yield_increase DECIMAL(10, 2),
   profit_increase DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Field_Trials (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   trial_date DATE,
   crop_name VARCHAR(255),
   yield_obtained DECIMAL(10, 2),
   gmo_field BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE farm_data (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 farm_name VARCHAR(50),
 location VARCHAR(100),
 total_acres INT,
 gmo_usage BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE economic_benefits (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name TEXT,
    gmo_status TEXT,
    yield_increase FLOAT,
    profit_increase FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE research_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    conclusion TEXT,
    impact_on_farmers TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE farmers_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_id TEXT,
    region TEXT,
    crop_planted TEXT,
    gmo_usage_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id TEXT,
    question TEXT,
 response TEXT,
 response_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id TEXT,
    researcher_name TEXT,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE
);
